summary:
"The Twilight Saga: New Moon" is a 2009 American fantasy romance film directed by Chris Weitz. It's based on Stephenie Meyer's 2006 novel and is the second movie in the Twilight series. The story continues Bella Swan's (Kristen Stewart) journey after Edward Cullen (Robert Pattinson) leaves. She forms a deep bond with Jacob Black (Taylor Lautner).

The movie was a box office hit, making over $711 million worldwide, despite mixed reviews. It set records for midnight openings and DVD sales. The success led to three more sequels.
title: The Twilight Saga New Moon
